### Bio

I'm currently a solution architect working at the intersection of Marketing, Technology & Analytics (ML). I'm also a [R](https://www.r-project.org/) & [Shiny](https://shiny.posit.co/) developer with multiple enterprise non-commercial products. Besides, I also provide consultation for SME related to data architecture.

I'm currently heading Mar-Tech department for [OSIM International](https://www.linkedin.com/company/osim-international-ltd/), where I'm implementing the foundation and driving the roadmap for regional digitalization journey on cloud computing, AI/ML utilization and data maturity Improvement and reshaping the retail landscape to enhance the shopping experience for the enterprise.

Previously, I served as Head of Analytics for BIG Loyalty (now re-branded as [airasia rewards](https://www.linkedin.com/company/airasiarewards/)) , driving the ML & data engineering department to provide data-driven solution for loyalty, particularly in aviation and hospitality.

Before that, I lead regional operation BI team at e-commerce platform [Lazada](https://www.linkedin.com/company/lazada/) (later acquired by Alibaba), driving the insights and data-driven products mainly for logistics and seller operation.

I acquired my MBA from [CSU](https://www.linkedin.com/school/columbia-southern-university/) with main interest in Global Strategic Planning in 2024. I graduated from [HCMUT](https://www.linkedin.com/company/hcmut/) (one of the top university in Vietnam) 's special program from [University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign](https://www.linkedin.com/school/university-of-illinois-urbana-champaign/) , with Degree of Electrical & Electronic Engineering back in 2011.

On this website I keep a list of my technical blog, presentations as well as my resume.
